title: WTB: T206 Ty Cobb Red Portrait
author: VintageBen

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Ty Cobb Red Portrait
posts.post_content:
Looking for a well-centered PSA/SGC 2 or 3 that presents well over grade.

Thanks in advance!!!
There has to be a nice red Cobb out there in the psa/sgc 2-3 range. Please find me!!!

It is a seller market across the board on Cobb. Perhaps post an aggressive buy price on the grades you want.

Good luck.

[quote name="PhillipAbbott79" post=1664763]It is a seller market across the board on Cobb. Perhaps post an aggressive buy price on the grades you want.

Good luck.[/QUOTE]

Phil,
Thanks for the suggestion, but I think it would be premature to make an offer on a card based solely on grade without first seeing and evaluating it. As I am sure you know, there is a wide range of values within each grade depending on the appearance and presentation of the card. I will gladly make a fair offer once I see the card, but I will not make an offer based solely on a grade without first seeing the card. 

Thanks, 



Ben

Yea. I understand, but you could specify your requirements for the price range.

Someone messages me by accident, so maybe you have a lead. 

Good luck.
My Cobb red is a 2, and this one looks better, so you did get a good one for the grade. Congratulations.   :)
